patthana1.22:1.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:1.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:2.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:2.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:3.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.22:4.1_0: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha dve), avigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:6.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:6.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:6.1_4: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.22:7.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:7.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.22:8.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.22:8.1_2: ninnānākaraṇaṁ) napurejātapaccayā—arūpe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca …pe…
patthana1.22:9.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:10.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bahiddhārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.22:11.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi) …
patthana1.22:12.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana1.22:12.1_1: bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:12.1_3: navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:13.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:14.1_4: naāsevane nakamme navipāke najhāne namagge navippayutte dve.
patthana1.22:16.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā dve …pe… navipāke dve, navippayutte dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:21.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:21.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:22.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.22:23.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.22:24.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhā viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.22:24.1_8: ajjhattārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe…
patthana1.22:25.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ bahiddhā dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.22:25.1_7: Bahiddhārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe…
patthana1.22:26.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.22:27.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.22:27.1_4: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.22:27.1_10: ajjhattārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.22:27.1_11: taṁ garuṁ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.22:28.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:29.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:29.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.22:29.1_6: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.22:29.1_13: bahiddhārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.22:29.1_14: taṁ garuṁ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.22:30.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā ajjhattārammaṇā
patthana1.22:30.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:31.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ
patthana1.22:31.1_2: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ bahiddhārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:31.1_3: Ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā bahiddhārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:32.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā bahiddhārammaṇā
patthana1.22:32.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:33.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ
patthana1.22:33.1_2: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ ajjhattārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:33.1_3: Bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā ajjhattārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:34.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.22:35.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:36.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:37.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:38.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:39.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā ajjhattārammaṇā
patthana1.22:39.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:40.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ anulomaṁ gotrabhussa,
patthana1.22:41.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā bahiddhārammaṇā

patthana1.22:42.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana1.22:42.1_4: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
